title: Hawkeye, Volume 2: Little Hits
description: Ace archer Clint Barton faces the digital doomsday of—DVR-Mageddon! Then: Cherry's got a gun. And she looks good in it. And Hawkeye gets very, very distracted. Plus: Valentine's Day with the heartthrob of the Marvel Universe? This will be... confusing.Collects Hawkeye (2012) #6–11.
author: Matt Fraction
